root: ^Your character push forward, and notice that the bug of the next enemy is a mess of random pixel.
^‘A sorceress is facing you, she detected you from the distance and is ready to charge towards you.’
^Remembering the type of armor you got, you are relieved to not know what kind of sprite  they should have been for a sorceress.

sorceress_attack: ^‘Well witches are sexy but they aren’t necessarily bad no ?’
^‘Until they turn you into a frog !’
^‘Damn, this game is super buggy, now we’ll never know if she’s nice or not !’
^‘Well a friend copied this hacked version so I guess you have to expect this sort of things ?’
^‘I guess they could if they wanted to.’
^‘The bugs are a bit odd I have to say...’
sorceress_negociate: ^‘Hey again dear ! Well that’s a weird option ! But I’m always down for some non-violence.’
^‘You introduce yourself and state that your intentions are to rescue a princess, not start war with the witch-kind.’
^‘Well a friend copied this hacked version so I guess you have to expect this sort of things ?’
^‘At least she doesn’t seem to hurt you...’
^‘I guess so... I hope she didn’t have any artifact to give me though.’
^‘The bugs are a bit odd I have to say...’
